Class LogSetup

java.lang.Object
  logger.LogSetup

public class LogSetup
extends java.lang.Object

Represents the initialization for the server logging with Log4J.

logdir

private java.lang.String logdir
Constructor Detail

LogSetup

public LogSetup(java.lang.String logdir,
                org.apache.log4j.Level level)
         throws java.io.IOException
Initializes the logging for the echo server. Logs are appended to the console output and written into a separated server log file at a given destination.

Parameters:
logdir - the destination (i.e. directory + filename) for the persistent logging information.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if the log destination could not be found.
